Olympics 2024: Live updates day eight - Emma Twigg wins silver in women’s single sculls, Tom Walsh and Jacko Gill go for gold https://www.nzherald.co.nz/sport/olympics/olympics-2024-live-updates-day-eight-emma-twigg-tom-mackintosh-row-for-single-sculls-gold/7VQP5A3AA5DOXD3LCOO7EWRRBM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/sport/olympics/olympics-2024-live-updates-day-eight-emma-twigg-tom-mackintosh-row-for-single-sculls-gold/7VQP5A3AA5DOXD3LCOO7EWRRBM/ Alex Powell, Christopher Reive , Kris Shannon, Michael Burgess, Cameron McMillanLive updates of all the action from the Paris Olympics on day eight. Sat, 03 Aug 2024 18:09:02 +0000 Emma Twigg with her silver medal from the women's silver sculls at the Paris Olympics. Photo / Photosport
Grieving husband on wife Jo Sione-Lauaki’s ‘unexplained’ death on Northland beach https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-investigating-womans-unexplained-death-on-northland-beach/XIGIRRFNRVH5FKQVCICPB5GRQU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-investigating-womans-unexplained-death-on-northland-beach/XIGIRRFNRVH5FKQVCICPB5GRQU/ Cherie Howie"She sent me a text that said, ‘Help’", Jared Sione-Lauaki says of wife Jo's final message Sat, 03 Aug 2024 09:01:24 +0000 Jo Sione-Lauaki, pictured with her husband Jared Sione-Lauaki. Jo was found dead on Omamari Beach in Northland on Friday in circumstances police have described as "unexplained". Jared has spoken to the Herald about the death of his wife and the mother of their eight kids.
Tipene Funerals apologises after bodies of prominent Auckland Samoans ‘treated like rubbish’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tipene-funerals-apologises-after-bodies-of-prominent-auckland-samoans-treatment-like-rubbish/2BZMSCGHZ5FNLBQ63RH4WT2N5I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tipene-funerals-apologises-after-bodies-of-prominent-auckland-samoans-treatment-like-rubbish/2BZMSCGHZ5FNLBQ63RH4WT2N5I/ Raphael FranksA former funeral director at Tipene Funerals swindled her grieving clients. Sat, 03 Aug 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Fiona Bakulich (inset top) was employed by Francis Tipene (inset bottom) at Tipene Funerals, but it has been revealed Bakulich swindled her clients by improperly interring their dead relatives in the public mausoleum at Waikumete Cemetery. Photos / Michael Craig, Dean Purcell
Prisoner Huata Irving ingested meth bag, after being allowed out for tangi, which later burst inside him https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/prisoner-huata-irving-ingested-meth-bag-after-being-allowed-out-for-tangi-which-later-burst-inside-him/6BJBFQNJWVG7ZHBONHGIPU7MBM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/prisoner-huata-irving-ingested-meth-bag-after-being-allowed-out-for-tangi-which-later-burst-inside-him/6BJBFQNJWVG7ZHBONHGIPU7MBM/ Belinda FeekJudge tells Huata Irving, who was hospitalised, he's the “author of his own misfortune".
